<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120126</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120126</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">5 gramski kovanec na  vrtečem se gramofonu</string>
            <string language="en">5 Gram Coin on Spinning Gramophone Record</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">5 Gramm-Münze auf spinnender Schallplatte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pièce de monnaie de 5 grammes sur 
l'enregistrement de phonographe de rotation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">moeda de 5 gramas no registro de gramophone 
girando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">una moneta da 5 grammi sul disco grammofonico di 
filatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">5 Νόμισμα γραμμαρίου στην περιστροφή gramophone του 
αρχείου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">moneda de 5 gramos en expediente de gramófono que
hace girar</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Določi sile, ki delujejo na kovanec na vrteči se gramofonski plošči.</string>
            <string language="en">Determine the forces that are acting on an coin that is placed on a spinning gramophone record.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">krožno gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">circular motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">newtonovi zakoni</string>
            <string language="en">newton's laws</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie die Kräfte fest, die auf einer Münze
fungieren, die auf eine spinnende Schallplatte plaziert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminez les forces qui agissent sur une pièce
de monnaie qui est placée sur un enregistrement de phonographe de 
rotation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determine as forças que estão agindo em uma 
moeda que seja colocada em um registro de gramophone girando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determini le forze che stanno comportandosi su una
moneta che è disposta su un disco grammofonico di filatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορίστε τις δυνάμεις που ενεργούν σε ένα νόμισμα 
που τοποθετείται σε ένα περιστρεφόμενο gramophone αρχείο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determine las fuerzas que están actuando en una 
moneda que se coloque en un expediente de gramófono que hace girar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kreisförmige Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetze des Newtons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement circulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les lois de newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento circular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leis do newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento circolare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">leggi del Newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυκλική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμοι Newton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento circular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">leyes del neutonio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
